content: After a happy period using [Rdio](http://www.rdio.com) I've switched back to Spotify for all my music listening needs. Despite a much larger catalogue, the killer feature Spotify lacked was a collection of albums, something Rdio's UI manages very well. But with its new(ish) reboot, [Spotify now supports how I want to play music](http://news.spotify.com/uk/2014/04/02/spotify-paints-it-black-with-new-look/). Switched.
